Dear Dr. Carter:
div1.p:
We would like very much to
have you abstract for us the following article
on Yellow Fever, “Behavior of the heart in the
experimental infection of guinea pigs and mon-
keys with Leptospira icteroides and Leptospira
icterohemorrhagica, by A. E. Cohn and H. Noguchi,
J. Exper. Med., June, 1921: 683,” for the Survey
of Literature to be issued this month; also any
other articles that you have in mind that may
have appeared in the last six months on the sub-
ject.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, THOMAS NELSON & SONS. MB Crowell
Office Editor.
